sen.j: 成澤秀麗（なりさわ しゅうれい、1972年（昭和47年）-）は、山形県鶴岡市出身の書道。
sen.e: Shurei NARUSAWA (1972 -) is a calligrapher who came from Tsuruoka City, Yamagata Prefecture.
Shurei NARISAWA (1972 -) is a calligrapher who came from Tsuruoka City, Yamagata Prefecture.
Shurei NARISAWA (1972 -) is a calligrapher who came from Tsuruoka City, Yamagata Prefecture.

sen.j: 書道普及協会会長。
sen.e: He is the president of SYODO FUKYU KYOKAI (Association for Popularization of the Japanese Calligraphy).
sen.cmt: 「書道普及協会」の訳は、会長の下記サイトにある正式名の単語を並べ替えて入力しました。http://www.narisawashurei.com/en/workexp.html
sen.e: She is the president of SYODO FUKYU KYOKAI (Association for Popularization of the Japanese Calligraphy).
sen.cmt: 女性のため、He→Sheに修正 (参考: http://www.narisawashurei.com/)
sen.e: She is the president of SYODO FUKYU KYOKAI (Association for Popularization of the Japanese Calligraphy).

sen.j: 5歳より書道を始め、12歳までに五段取得。
sen.e: He started calligraphy at the age of five and obtained Godan (the fifth rank) before 12 years old.
She started calligraphy at the age of five and obtained Godan (the fifth rank) before 12 years old.
She started calligraphy at the age of five and obtained Godan (the fifth rank) before 12 years old.

sen.j: 1999年、日本教育書道藝術院に入学し大溪洗耳に師事。
sen.e: He entered Nihon Kyoiku Shodo Geijutuin (Japan Educational Calligraphy Art Institute) in 1999 and studied under Senji OTANI.
sen.cmt: 「大溪洗耳」の読み方は、下記サイト①から引用、「日本教育書道藝術院」は、②のcopyrightの欄を参考にしました（括弧内の訳は直訳です）。 ①http://www.artis.net-in.to/default.asp?action=-1&koku=nasi&bun=nasi&nam=%8D%EC%89%C6%96% ②http://blog.shodou.co.jp/?cID=2
sen.e: She entered Nihon Kyoiku Shodo Geijutuin (Japan Educational Calligraphy Art Institute) in 1999 and studied under Senji OTANI.
She entered Nihon Kyoiku Shodo Geijutuin (Japan Educational Calligraphy Art Institute) in 1999 and studied under Senji OTANI.

sen.j: 墨絵画家、日本筆跡心理学協会認定 筆跡アドバイザーマスター、社団法人日本産業カウンセラー協会認定 産業カウンセラーなどの肩書きもある。
sen.e: His titles include Sumi painter, Handwriting Adviser Master approved by Nihonhissekishinrigakukyokai.Co.,Ltd. and Industrial Counselor approved by Japan Industrial Counselor Association.
sen.cmt: 「筆跡アドバイザーマスター」の訳は公式ではなく、直訳です。
sen.e: Her titles include Sumi painter, Handwriting Adviser Master approved by Japan Association of Graphology and Industrial Counselor approved by Japan Industrial Counselor Association.
sen.cmt: His→Herに修正、Nihonhissekishinrigakukyokai.Co.,Ltd.→Japan Association of Graphologyとしました。(参照: http://www.kcon-nemoto.com/)
sen.e: Her titles include Sumi painter, Handwriting Adviser Master approved by Japan Association of Graphology and Industrial Counselor approved by Japan Industrial Counselor Association.

sen.j: 書道家・墨絵画家としては雅号の「秀麗」のみで活動している。
sen.e: He uses only 'Shurei,' as his Gago (pseudonym) in his activities as calligrapher and sumi painter.
She uses only 'Shurei,' as her Gago (pseudonym) in her activities as calligrapher and sumi painter.
She uses only 'Shurei,' as her Gago (pseudonym) in her activities as calligrapher and sumi painter.

sen.j: 2000年 全国公募 第22回東京書作展 文部大臣奨励賞・準大賞（初出品）
sen.e: In 2000, at the 22nd Tokyo Shosakuten (Tokyo Calligraphy Exhibition) with national public call for entry, he received the Minister of Education Encouragement Prize and Tokyo Shosakuten Semi-grand prize (his first entry).
sen.cmt: 下記サイトを参考にしました。http://www.tokyo-np.co.jp/event/sho/
sen.e: 2000: At the 22nd Tokyo Shosakuten (Tokyo Calligraphy Exhibition) with national public call for entry, she received the Minister of Education Encouragement Prize and Tokyo Shosakuten Semi-grand prize (her first entry).
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→she、his→herに修正
sen.e: 2000: At the 22nd Tokyo Shosakuten (Tokyo Calligraphy Exhibition) with national public call for entry, she received the Minister of Education Encouragement Prize and Tokyo Shosakuten Semi-grand prize (her first entry).

sen.j: 2000年 日本教育書道藝術院にて書道師範を取得
sen.e: In 2000, he obtained at Nihon Kyoiku Shodo Geijutuin.
sen.cmt: 「取得」の目的語が欠落しています。
sen.e: 2000: She obtained the title of Shodo Shihan (Master Calligrapher) at Nihon Kyoiku Shodo Geijutuin.
sen.cmt: 原文の欠落部分「書道師範」をウェブより補い、訳出しました。統一リストの表記に修正、he→Sheに修正
sen.e: 2000: She obtained the title of Shodo Shihan (Master Calligrapher) at Nihon Kyoiku Shodo Geijutuin.

sen.j: 2001年 全国公募 第23回東京書作展 内閣総理大臣賞・大賞（2回目）
sen.e: In 2001, at the 23rd Tokyo Shosakuten, he received the Prime Minister Prize and Tokyo Shosakuten Grand prize (his second winning).
2001: At the 23rd Tokyo Shosakuten, she received the Prime Minister Prize and Tokyo Shosakuten Grand prize (his second winning).
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→sheに修正
sen.e: 2001: At the 23rd Tokyo Shosakuten, she received the Prime Minister Prize and Tokyo Shosakuten Grand prize (his second winning).

sen.j: 2001年 全国公募 第23回東京書作展 東京新聞賞
sen.e: In 2001, at the 23rd Tokyo Shosakuten, he received the Tokyo Shimbun Prize.
2001: At the 23rd Tokyo Shosakuten, she received the Tokyo Shimbun Prize.
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→sheに修正
sen.e: 2001: At the 23rd Tokyo Shosakuten, she received the Tokyo Shimbun Prize.

sen.j: 2001年 全国公募 第23回東京書作展 特選
sen.e: In 2001, at the 23rd Tokyo Shosakuten, he received the Special commendation prize.
2001: At the 23rd Tokyo Shosakuten, she received the Special commendation prize.
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→sheに修正
sen.e: 2001: At the 23rd Tokyo Shosakuten, she received the Special commendation prize.

sen.j: 2002年 第24回日本教育書道藝術院同人会展 会長賞（無鑑査から審査会員へ３階級特進）
sen.e: In 2002, at the 24th Nihon Kyoiku Shodo Geijutuin Dojinkai ten (Japan Educational Calligraphy Art Institute Club Exhibition), he received the President's prize (He was promoted from exemption of examination to a member of the examining meeting, jumping two ranks).

2002: At the 24th Nihon Kyoiku Shodo Geijutuin Dojinkai ten (Japan Educational Calligraphy Art Institute Club Exhibition), she received the President's prize (She was promoted from exemption of examination to a member of the examining meeting, jumping two ranks).
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→sheに修正
sen.e: 2002: At the 24th Nihon Kyoiku Shodo Geijutuin Dojinkai ten (Japan Educational Calligraphy Art Institute Club Exhibition), she received the President's prize (She was promoted from exemption of examination to a member of the examining meeting, jumping two ranks).

sen.j: 2003年 全国公募 第25回東京書作展 審査会員推挙
sen.e: In 2003, at the 25th Tokyo Shosakuten, he was recommended for a member of the examining meeting.
2003: At the 25th Tokyo Shosakuten, she was recommended for a member of the examining meeting.
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→sheに修正
sen.e: 2003: At the 25th Tokyo Shosakuten, she was recommended for a member of the examining meeting.

sen.j: 2003年 日本教育書道藝術院同人会 評議員となる
sen.e: In 2003, he became a councilor of Nihon Kyoiku Shodo Geijutuin Dojinkai.
2003: She became a councilor of Nihon Kyoiku Shodo Geijutuin Dojinkai.
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→Sheに修正
sen.e: 2003: She became a councilor of Nihon Kyoiku Shodo Geijutuin Dojinkai.

sen.j: 2004年 東京書作展 審査会員となる
sen.e: In 2004, he became a member of the examining meeting of the Tokyo Shosakuten.
2004: She became a member of the examining meeting of the Tokyo Shosakuten.
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→Sheに修正
sen.e: 2004: She became a member of the examining meeting of the Tokyo Shosakuten.

sen.j: 2004年 書壇を離れる
sen.e: In 2004, he left the calligraphy world.
2004: She left the calligraphy world.
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→Sheに修正
sen.e: 2004: She left the calligraphy world.

tit.j: 書壇を離れてからの履歴
tit.e: Career after he left the calligraphy world
Career after she left the calligraphy world
Career after she left the calligraphy world

sen.j: 2004年 書道普及協会を創立。
sen.e: In 2004, he established the SYODO FUKYU KYOKAI.
2004: She established the SYODO FUKYU KYOKAI.
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→Sheに修正
sen.e: 2004: She established the SYODO FUKYU KYOKAI.

sen.j: 雅号を煌藍より翠玲へ改名。
sen.e: He changed his Gago (pseudonym), from Shurei to Suirei.
She changed her Gago (pseudonym), from Shurei to Suirei.
She changed her Gago (pseudonym), from Shurei to Suirei.

sen.j: 2005年 第一回個展「遊美」Pleasure and Beauty -Japanese calligraphy with painting-（ニューヨーク）
sen.e: In 2005, he held his first personal exhibition 'Pleasure and Beauty'-Japanese calligraphy with painting (New York).
2005: She held her first personal exhibition 'Pleasure and Beauty'-Japanese calligraphy with painting (New York).
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→She、his→herに修正
sen.e: 2005: She held her first personal exhibition 'Pleasure and Beauty'-Japanese calligraphy with painting (New York).

sen.j: 2005年 奥山門揮毫（浅草寺西門・奥山おまいりまち入り口）
sen.e: In 2005, he wrote calligraphy on the nameplate of Oku-sanmon (inner gate) (The west gate of Senso-ji Temple and the entrance to Okuyama omairimichi (approach to the temple). Carving: Shingoro HOTTA
2005: She wrote calligraphy on the nameplate of Oku-sanmon (inner gate) (The west gate of Senso-ji Temple and the entrance to Okuyama omairimichi (approach to the temple).
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→Sheに修正
sen.e: 2005: She wrote calligraphy on the nameplate of Oku-sanmon (inner gate) (The west gate of Senso-ji Temple and the entrance to Okuyama omairimichi (approach to the temple).

sen.j: ※彫刻；堀田新五郎
sen.e: Carving: Shingoro HOTTA
Carving: Shingoro HOTTA

sen.j: 2006年 第二回個展「春酔」 Spring Entrancement（玉川高島屋）
sen.e: In 2006, he held his second personal exhibition 'Spring Entrancement' (Tamagawa Takashimaya).
2006: She held her second personal exhibition 'Spring Entrancement' (Tamagawa Takashimaya).
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→She、his→herに修正

sen.e: In 2006, he participated in Flower Festival (UN Headquarters in New York).
2006, She participated in Flower Festival (UN Headquarters in New York).

sen.e: In 2006, he held his third personal exhibition (New York).
2006: She held her third personal exhibition (New York).
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→She、his→herに修正、余分なスペース消去

sen.j: 2006年 ワークショップ Atelier de la calligraphie japonaise（日仏文化センター／フランス・パリ）
sen.e: In 2006, he held a workshop 'Atelier de la calligraphie japonaise' (French Japanese Cultural Center/Paris, France).
sen.cmt: 「日仏文化センター」は、下記サイトの「Centre Culturel France Japonais」を英語に訳しましたhttp://www.ccfj-paris.org/Nihongo/index-jp.html

sen.e: In 2007, he changed his Gago, from Suirei to Shurei.
2007: She changed her Gago, from Suirei to Shurei.
sen.cmt: 統一リストの表記に修正、he→She、his→herに修正

sen.e: In 2007, he participated in the 18th Exhibition for 'Export of Japanese Art' at Artexpo 2007 NY (New York).

sen.e: He graduated from Department of Economics, Faculty of Economics, Tohoku Gakuin University.
